channel.title: CVE Feed for Eview -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eview -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-5239|2024-08-05T14:55:35.799Z -- eview -- ev-07s%20gps%20tracker
item.description: Due to a lack of standard encryption when transmitting sensitive information over the internet to a centralized monitoring service, the Eview EV-07S GPS Tracker discloses personally identifying information, such as GPS data and IMEI numbers, to any man-in-the-middle (MitM) listener.

item.title: CVE-2017-5238|2024-08-05T14:55:35.783Z -- eview -- ev-07s%20gps%20tracker
item.description: Due to a lack of bounds checking, several input configuration fields for the Eview EV-07S GPS Tracker will overflow data stored in one variable to another, overwriting the data of another field.

item.title: CVE-2017-5237|2024-08-05T14:55:35.682Z -- eview -- ev-07s%20gps%20tracker
item.description: Due to a lack of authentication, an unauthenticated user who knows the Eview EV-07S GPS Tracker's phone number can revert the device to a factory default configuration with an SMS command, "RESET!"
